00020 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TIMEINLINE_H
00021 #define HYPERTABLE_TIMEINLINE_H
00022 
00023 #include <stdexcept>
00024 
00025 // Some header only code (no link/runtime library dependency)
00026 namespace Hypertable {
00027 
00028 #ifndef HT_DELIM_CHECK
00029 # define HT_DELIM_CHECK(_l_, _c_) do { \
00030     if ((_l_) != (_c_)) \
00031       throw std::runtime_error("expected " #_l_ " to be " #_c_); \
00032   } while (0)
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #ifndef HT_RANGE_CHECK
00036 # define HT_RANGE_CHECK(_v_, _min_, _max_) do { \
00037     if ((_v_) < (_min_) || (_v_) > (_max_)) \
00038       throw std::range_error(#_v_ " must be between " #_min_ " and " #_max_); \
00039   } while (0)
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 // Parse timestamp format in YYYY-mm-dd[ HH:MM[:SS[.NS]]]
00043 inline int64_t
00044 parse_ts(const char *ts) {
00045   const int64_t G = 1000000000LL;
00046   tm tv;
00047   char *last;
00048 
00049   memset(&tv, 0, sizeof(tm));
00050   tv.tm_year = strtol(ts, &last, 10) - 1900;
00051   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, '-');
00052   tv.tm_mon = strtol(last + 1, &last, 10) - 1;
00053   HT_RANGE_CHECK(tv.tm_mon, 0, 11);
00054   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, '-');
00055   tv.tm_mday = strtol(last + 1, &last, 10);
00056   HT_RANGE_CHECK(tv.tm_mday, 1, 31);
00057 
00058   if (*last == 0)
00059     return timegm(&tv) * G;
00060 
00061   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, ' ');
00062   tv.tm_hour = strtol(last + 1, &last, 10) - 1;
00063   HT_RANGE_CHECK(tv.tm_hour, 0, 23);
00064   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, ':');
00065   tv.tm_min = strtol(last + 1, &last, 10) - 1;
00066   HT_RANGE_CHECK(tv.tm_min, 0, 59);
00067 
00068   if (*last == 0)
00069     return timegm(&tv) * G;
00070 
00071   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, ':');
00072   tv.tm_sec = strtol(last + 1, &last, 10) - 1;
00073   HT_RANGE_CHECK(tv.tm_sec, 0, 60);
00074 
00075   if (*last == 0)
00076     return timegm(&tv) * G;
00077 
00078   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, '.');
00079   int64_t ns = strtoll(last + 1, &last, 10);
00080   HT_DELIM_CHECK(*last, 0);
00081 
00082   return timegm(&tv) * G + ns;
00083 }
00084 
00085 } // namespace Hypertable

00087 #endif /* HYPERTABLE_TIMEINLINE_H */
